title: As Israelâ€™s Far Right Nears Power, Palestinians Feel a Pang of Fear
description: To some Palestinians, the rise of the Israeli far right can scarcely make things worse. But many fear a surge of violence.
dc:creator: Patrick Kingsley, Hiba Yazbek and Raja Abdulrahim
media:credit: Amit Elkayam for The New York Times
media:description: Benjamin Netanyahu on election night. Barring a last-minute change of heart, he will form a government with a far-right bloc, which worries Palestinians.
